structure.unit: Regulations And By Laws Relative To Ways And Bridges

law.catch_line: Permit For Certain Vehicles Exceeding Weight Limitations To Operate On Through Routes; Application; Notice Of Approval Or Disapproval; Violations; Revocation Or Suspension Of Permit

text.section: The make, model and year of the motor vehicle, trailer, semi-trailer or semi-trailer unit to which the permit is to apply, including the said gross vehicle weight rating and the weight for which it is registered.
The name, business address and residential address, if any, of the owner or lessee of the motor vehicle, trailer, semi-trailer or semi-trailer unit.
The name and address of the insurer of the motor vehicle, trailer, semi-trailer or semi-trailer unit.
The maximum weight sought for such motor vehicle, trailer, semi-trailer or semi-trailer unit.
The period of time for which such permit is sought, which shall not exceed one year from the date on which it is issued by the commissioner of highways.
